name: Greater Reposition
text: When you reposition foes, they are left vulnerable to the attacks of your allies.
prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: You receive a +2 bonus on checks made to reposition a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Improved Reposition. Whenever you reposition a foe, his movement provokes attacks of opportunity from all of your allies (but not you).
normal: Creatures moved by reposition do not provoke attacks of opportunity.
staminaText: You can select this feat even if you don’t meet the ability score prerequisite (Intelligence 13). You gain the benefits of this feat only as long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool. When attempting to reposition a foe, you can spend 5 stamina points to increase your melee reach by 5 feet for the purpose of determining where you can move the foe.
text_zh: 当你改变敌人的位置时，他们会变得容易遭受你盟友的攻击。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通移位，BAB+6。
benefit_zh: 你所实行的移位战技检定获得+2加值。这个加值与“精通移位”提供的加值叠加。每当你通过移位使敌人移动时，他的移动会引起你的盟友的借机攻击（但是不包括你）。
normal_zh: 由于移位战技而移动的生物不会引起借机攻击。
staminaText_zh: 在你并不满足这个专长的属性先决条件（智力13）时你也能选择这个专长。只有当你在耐力池中拥有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。当你对一个敌人尝试移位时，你可以消耗5点耐力，这样在决定你能把你的敌人移动到哪里时你的触及会提升5迟。
